The paragraph does not mention any diseases. It only talks about the determination of serum creatinine levels. Creatinine is a waste product found in the blood and urine, and its levels can be used as an indicator of kidney function. However, the paragraph itself does not describe it as a disease, but rather as a substance whose levels are being measured.
